column1: Art Institute of Chicago////If you find art museums to be stuffy/pretentious
column2: I would highly encourage you to pay a visit to AIC - especially leading up to the opening of the new Modern Wing in '09
column3: there are going to be some amazing exhibitions. And don't try to cover the entire museum in one day - Thursday and Friday evening are free this summer
column4: so check out a few galleries and then come back the next week! Your experience will be much more pleasant that way :)
